title: Contemporary Scandinavia: common purposes, individual differences
creator_credit: Richard Kaplan Productions, McGraw-Hill Films and Richard Kaplan
brief_description: An overview of modern life in Denmark, Norway and Sweden. Describes their unique political organisation, stressing at the same time, national differences. Discusses the influence of both geography and modern technology on economic and social organisation, and Scandinavia’s role in world affairs. Includes a sequence on youth and education.
